segments.text: I have been thinking of buying a house and would like to speak with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have time to speak with you . Where would you like to purchase your house ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am most interested in Pasadena or Arcadia , but would be open to other suggestions .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many bedrooms and bathrooms do you need ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have several generations of family living in our household and so need a very large home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you need to be located in a particular school district ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn â€™ t matter , as we do not have any children .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is a view important to you , or would you rather be located on a lakeshore lot ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In a perfect world , we would like a home with a view of the lake .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for all of the information . I will help you find the perfect house for you .
segments.speaker: S2
